blogPost.excerpt: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
blogPost.body: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
blogPost.title: Digital Stocking Stuffers - $1 or less digital products
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。
下載各種可以通過電子郵件發送給朋友和家人的好東西。不要在商場裏閒逛，滾動清單。呆在家裏，把你的禮物通過電子郵件寄給你最喜歡的自助者、自助者和獨立黑客，這樣可以拯救生命。

previous.title:
The president suggested he may veto the stimulus bill because the $600 relief payments are “ridiculously low."

Democrats, who have supported a much larger relief package, jumped on the opportunity to push for an expansion. House Republicans blocked that. https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs

localize.full_text:
总统暗示他可能会否决刺激法案，因为600美元的救济金“低得离谱”。

民主党人支持规模大得多的纾困方案，他们抓住机会推动扩张。众议院共和党人阻止了这一点。https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs

總統暗示他可能會否決刺激法案，因爲600美元的救濟金“低得離譜”。

民主黨人支持規模大得多的紓困方案，他們抓住機會推動擴張。衆議院共和黨人阻止了這一點。https://t.co/kGmy8WHEfs

localize.description: 我们制造会说话的形状。形状有个性，有边和角。
我們製造會說話的形狀。形狀有個性，有邊和角。
